label: Task-1
title: Security Review — Current Deployed System
description: Comprehensive security assessment of what currently exists and is deployed. List all known vulnerabilities, risks, and security concerns in the current setup including: admin Lambda, Lambda URL Functions, CI/CD pipelines, PyPI publishing, GitHub Actions, dependencies, auth model, CORS configuration.

properties.acceptance_criteria: Complete list of all known vulnerabilities and risks in current deployed infrastructure. No assumptions — ask questions to other roles for any unclear areas.
